about_the_game:
Synopsis

The kingdom of Ventorum has been attacked by aberrations, and Keris, the kingdom's finest knight, is determined to fulfill his duty alongside his order, which is now led by Selene, the great sorceress of Ventorum. Keris must confront the forces lurking in the shadows and question the ancient ideals that guide his steps: "The Gods are respected, humans are forgiven, monsters are pitied, and aberrations are annihilated" - this is the oath of the knights of Syrion.


"Keris' Veil" is a story of introspection, with hints of romance, where not everything is as it seems, aimed at an audience interested in rich stories with mystery and serious themes, as well as players seeking a good challenge.

Gameplay

Keris' Veil is an action-packed platformer where every jump counts. Navigate through challenging levels, overcoming obstacles with agility and precision. Explore vibrant environments and uncover hidden secrets. Strategic combat will keep you on your toes as you dodge and block enemy attacks to punish them with your attacks or abilities. Face epic and challenging boss battles to unlock new skills and progress through the story.
